#ifndef  _GV_HANDLE_
#define  _GV_HANDLE_

#include <gvsfstring.h>
#include <gvmfstring.h>
#include <gvsffloat.h>
#include <gvsftime.h>
#include <gvsfcolor.h>
#include <gvsfvec3f.h>
#include <gvmffloat.h>
#include <gvsfbool.h>
#include <gvmfcolor.h>
#include <gvsfnode.h>


#include <gvsubnode.h>

#include <gv2group.h>


class GTraversal;
class GView;



class GvHandle : public Gv2Group {

    GV_NODE_HEADER(GvHandle);

  public:
    // Fields
    GvSFNode            theNode;


};


class GvBoxHandle : public GvHandle 
{

    GV_NODE_HEADER(GvBoxHandle);

  public:
          GvBool createProxy(const BBox &bbox);

};


enum TextureOp {
        OP_IMAGE_TEXTURE,
        OP_MOVIE_TEXTURE,
        OP_PIXEL_TEXTURE,
        OP_TEXTURED_RECT,
        OP_MOVIE_RECT,
        OP_BACKGROUND,
        OP_ELEVATION_GRID,
        OP_ELEVATION_GRID_TEXTURED,
        OP_ELEVATION_GRID_COLORED,
};

/*

  create a node for image

*/

GvNode *TextureToNode(int fileFormat,const char *fileName,int op);



#endif /* _GV_HANDLE_ */
